content:
I got a KitchenAid stand mixer, and I love it. I've been using it nonstop since I got it. I've made cookies, bread, muffins, and even some granola bars. The dough hook has been a lifesaver, especially when making bread. I've also been experimenting with different attachments, like the whisk and paddle. They've made whipping cream and eggs so much easier.

Do you have any tips on how to clean and maintain my stand mixer? I want to make sure it lasts for a long time.
